articles.title: Nitish Kumar Told Amit Shah Not To Worry 2 Days Ago, Says BJP: 10 Facts
articles.description: Amit Shah called Nitish Kumar a day before the Bihar Chief Minister dumped the BJP and was assured that he had "nothing to worry about", senior BJP leader Sushil Modi told NDTV, in the first admission by the party that it tried to save the alliance.
